thread.title: Video: Greek banks reopen: chaotic scenes as people rush to withdraw pensions
thread.title_full: Video: Greek banks reopen: chaotic scenes as people rush to withdraw pensions - Telegraph

author: Telegraph video , and AP
title: Video: Greek banks reopen: chaotic scenes as people rush to withdraw pensions
text: There were chaotic scenes outside a branch of Greece's National Bank in Athens on Wednesday as it opened its doors to allow elderly customers access their pensions. The finance ministry is opening around 1,000 bank branches across the country for three days beginning on Wednesday to allow pensioners without bank cards to make withdrawals. Greece lost access to existing financing as the international bailout formally expired at midnight Brussels time. Eurozone finance chiefs decided not to extend it a new financial lifeline on Tuesday. Denied a last-minute bailout extension, Greece at midnight also became the first developed nation to miss a payment to the International Monetary Fund. The embattled Greek government had closed banks on Monday, blocked credit card use and issued capital controls that limit cash machine withdrawals. Follow @telegraphnews
